value: Whale watching from July to October
Fishing on the reef with local fishermen
Livingstone bats (giant fruit eating bats endemic on Moheli)
Boating, sailing, canoes and kayaks, bikes
Hiking in coastal and primary rain forest
Local artisanat (carpets from sisal, potteries, embroideries)

Visit the website of the House of Eco-tourism of Moheli on:

value: price=Prices from 60euros for two (total for two guests in double occupancy bungalow room) half board and all taxes included. Restaurant from 3.60 euros for starters and from 6.60 for main dishes. Full board supplement 11 euros. Reduction for children under 10 of 5 euros per meal.

content=Restaurant, "Whale bar" and three beaches. Serves delicious food and lies on the most beautiful site of Moheli facing the inhabitated coral reef, isles. Family and Child friendly. All hiking and boating services available (whale watching from July to end of October, fishing, coral reef snorkeling, waterfalls of Meringoni, Livingstone Bat reserve, ponding by Giant Green Sea Turtle at night, hiking in coastal and primary forest, canoes, kayaks, bikes, ping-pong, badminton, beach volleyball, etc. Ask for Mr. Ally Youssouf, manager.
